input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

product title:
Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings 1892

Product features:
Attractive Poster Reprint of magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings
Printed at 16 x 24 in.
HIgh quality, non-glossy photo paper
1892

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
The poster magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings 1892 is a high-quality, non-glossy photo paper printed at 16 x 24 inches. It is a beautiful reproduction of a magician pulling roses out of a top hat surrounded by supernatural beings from 1892.

This poster is a great addition to any magic or antique collection and would make a fantastic gift for anyone who loves magic, history, or the supernatural.
input_text.Response B: These are brand new in mint condition. They are a great fashion accessory and will make a perfect gift! They are guaranteed to be delivered within 3-5 business days via USPS standard shipping Monday thru Friday 8AM-12PM. We do not offer any forms of Expedited Shipping. Please try sunglasses on to ensure proper fit first. Please Do Not remove the Tag. Please try sunglasses on to ensure proper fit first. 14 days merchandise exchange guarantee. Thank you kindly for your valued purchase consideration.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
